New Records: Mickey Moniak hit his 13th homer of the season
Key Match Events: Mickey Moniak hit a first-inning three-run homer
Taylor Ward homered in his third straight game
Niko Kavadas also went deep in the long-struggling Angels' second victory over the major league-leading Dodgers
Post-Match Reflections: Bobby Miller (2-4) had another rough outing for the Dodgers, who lost for only the fourth time in 16 games
Miscellaneous Highlights: Angel Stadium was sold out for the second straight night, giving the Halos five sellouts this season
Others: Yoshinobu Yamamoto will return to the rotation Tuesday after missing nearly three months with a right arm injury
RHP Carson Fulmer is playing catch again after going on the injured list late last month with right elbow inflammation
